title: Will Winter Wonder Lulu be Available this Christmas or anyone have code?
body:
Hi, 
I joined LoL a couple months ago, but I really like the winter lulu skin.
I have been searching around the net to find whether riot will be selling the skin again this year, but most threads are last year's.
Do you think/know whether it will be back?
Or if anyone still miraculously have a code for her skin, I am definitely willing to purchase it as well.

replies.body: I'm 95% sure it will come out again this Christmas... Not  certain, but very likely due to the fact of them releasing every Christmas skin at Christmas time... Who knows, they might release it again even earlier then Christmas...
